channel.title: Unclaimed lies - Audio indecency [unsure] need feedback/ideas
channel.description:
Hi, i have a track i have been working on for a while. Made Good progress and then i hit a wall. So i wanted to see If any one has input/ideas of how to Take it forward.
Its a WIP so its divided into two sections that i havent ties together. It also lacks some type of melody after the build up in the first section.
Im happy for any feedback i can get.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/jVNgbSJHaRGPtYisKRagXg==

item.title: Unclaimed lies - Audio indecency [unsure] need feedback/ideas
item.dc:creator: ulfdahlstrand
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback. The noice really sounded different when lowering the destortion

item.title: Unclaimed lies - Audio indecency [unsure] need feedback/ideas
item.dc:creator: The_Osprey
item.description:
Nice! I think you should lower the distortion on horror and make the first scene 4 bars instead of 8.
